alert.note: Alert for Faribault; Freeborn (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 11:04AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Freeborn and southeastern Faribault Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1104 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Frost, or 22 miles northwest of Forest City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bricelyn around 1115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Emmons, Mansfield and Conger. This includes Interstate 90 near mile marker 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
